plot: Phil has a phenomenal ability, but one that - practically speaking - seems all but useless. That is, until an accidental encounter convinces him that he may have a chance to be a real superhero.
title: Touched by a Lawyer
plot_es: Phil has a phenomenal ability, but one that - practically speaking - seems all but useless. That is, until an accidental encounter convinces him that he may have a chance to be a real superhero.
plot_en: Phil has a phenomenal ability, but one that - practically speaking - seems all but useless. That is, until an accidental encounter convinces him that he may have a chance to be a real superhero.
